loc_success_offer_desc: You have successfully made an offer.
loc_import_wallet_new: Import your wallet or create a new one
loc_recovery_phrase_desc: If you delete the Rabbit App or lose your devices, you'll need your recovery phrase to regain access to your assets.
loc_congrats_description: You can now communicate with the  seller using the message icon
loc_your_recovery_desc: Enter your recovery phrase (usually 12 words) in the correct order. Separate each word with a single space only (no commas or any other punctuation)
loc_welcome_description: First thing - you'll need to set up your wallet.Let's get started
loc_dash_title: The Fastest Way To Buy Or Sell Property
loc_phrase_title: Write down your secret  recovery phrase
loc_wallet_setup_sub_title: Import wallet or create a new one
loc_set_pin_description: Protect yourself with a personalized Pin.
loc_confirm_phrase_description: This is your secret phrase.Write down in a physical place and keep it safe.
loc_phrase_description: This is your secret phrase. Write down in a physical place and keep it safe.
loc_phrase_check_txt: I understand that Rabbit will not recover my password and I take full responsibility for its safety.
loc_noti_txt_dis: Get updates on your account, new features and more. You can change this any time in settings.
loc_detaile_txt_dis_1: This beautiful apartment is located on the prestigious area of Florissant, in the near suburbs of Geneva, just a few minutes’ walk from downtown’s shops, cafés, boutiques and restaurants.
loc_detaile_txt_dis_2: Located in a high end residence complete with a swimming pool, beautiful community garden and two concierges.  Located on the 3rdfloor , the apartment spreads over 172 sqm with two balconies of 13 sqm each.
loc_detaile_txt_dis_3: The reception area includes a hall, 2 drawing rooms and a dining room with direct access to the pantry / kitchen.
loc_detaile_txt_dis_4: The night area layout is as follows:  a master bedroom with en suite bathroom and dressing along with 2  additional bedrooms each en suite.  All bedrooms have balcony access.
loc_detaile_txt_dis_5: The night area is in need of a refresh and some light works.
loc_bus_question: Is this for a business or personal?
loc_indi_txt1: Pease enter your legal personal information, including your name, email, and phone number.
loc_indi_txt2: Please provide your location details, including your city, state, zip code, and address.
loc_indi_txt3: Please enter your identity information, including your social security number, date of birth, and any other relevant identification details.
loc_indi_txt4: To complete the identity Verification process, please upload your government issued photo ID and proof of address
loc_verify_txt: Now you can buy or sell properties
loc_bus_head: Enter Your Business Information and Location
loc_bus_txt1: Please enter your business's information and location, including the entity name and address.
loc_bus_txt2: Please enter relevant business dates, such as the date of incorporation and state of incorporation.
loc_bus_txt3: To complete the KYC process, please upload the necessary legal document to verify your business.
loc_wait_txt: We are hunting this information down
loc_we_need_txt: We are going to need to take a closer look, please continue using Rabbit while we verify your identity
